Collapse Specifications Actual Weight .30 lb(s) Compatibility Notes Maximum transfer rates: USB 3.0 connectivity delivers maximum performance for transferring files to and from this drive. High-capacity in a sleek design: With up to 2 TB capacity in a lightweight design, this drive is the ideal companion for users on the go. USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 compatibility: With this single drive you get compatibility with the latest USB 3.0 devices and backward compatibility with USB 2.0 devices as well. Improve PC performance: When your internal hard drive is almost full your PC slows down. Don't delete files. Free up space on your internal hard drive by transferring files to your WD Elements portable storage and get your laptop moving again. Formatted for Windows: Formatted NTFS and compatible with Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista or Windows XP. Can be reformatted for Mac. Instead of deleting its data, it makes more sense them on an external hard drive as the member of Western Digital to relocate to make room on the internal hard disk and bring the PC or laptop back up to speed. The portable drive element with USB 3.0 provides price-conscious users looking for a reliable, high capacity storage on the go, the highest data transfer speeds, versatile connectivity and 1TB of storage. With its lightweight, sleek black design, the external hard drive Western Digital Elements Portable is the perfect companion for users on the go. The USB 3.0 port here offers a maximum power of up to 500 MB / s for sharing files with this drive. Of course, the device is backward compatible with USB 2.0. The WD Elements is formatted with the NTFS file system, and therefore fully compatible with Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista and Windows XP. For use on a Mac to an external hard drive can easily reformat. Features: High-capacity in a sleek design - With up to 2 TB capacity in a lightweight design, this drive is the ideal companion for users on the go. Maximum transfer rates - USB 3.0 connectivity delivers maximum performance for transferring files to and from this drive. USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 compatibility - With this single drive you get compatibility with the latest USB 3.0 devices and backward compatibility with USB 2.0 devices as well. Improve PC performance - When your internal hard drive is almost full your PC slows down. Don't delete files. Free up space on your internal hard drive by transferring files to your WD Elements portable storage and get your laptop moving again. WD quality inside and out - We know your data is important to you. So we build the drive inside to our demanding requirements for durability, shock tolerance, and long-term reliability. Then we protect the drive with a durable enclosure designed for style and protection. Formatted for Windows® - Formatted NTFS and compatible with Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista® or Windows XP. Can be reformatted for Mac®. um design elegante. para Com até 2 TB de capacidade em um design leve , esta unidade é ideal para usuários que viajam companheiro .   Teste gratuita do software de backup.   O WD Elements Portable Hard Drive inclui uma versão de teste do software de backup WD SmartWare Pro , que permite fazer backup de arquivos no Elements WD conduzir ou na nuvem usando sua conta no DropBox ™ .   Compatibilidade com USB 3.0 e USB 2.0.   Com um único disco apoiará a mais recente dispositivos USB 3.0 e USB 2.0.   Melhora o desempenho do PC.   Se o disco rígido interno está quase cheio o seu PC fica mais lento. Não exclua arquivos . Libere espaço no seu disco rígido interno de transferência de arquivos para o seu disco rígido portátil WD Elements e depois desfrutar de seu laptop.   Qualidade WD por dentro e por fora   Sabemos seus dados é importante para você. Assim, a produção do disco interno de acordo com nossos rigorosos requisitos de durabilidade, resistência ao impacto e confiabilidade a longo prazo . Então, nós protegemos a unidade com um gabinete durável projetado para o estilo e proteção.   Formatado para Windows.   Com formato NTFS e compatível com o Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista ® ou Windows XP. Pode ser reformatado para Mac ® . html_text: Tacori Blooming Beauties HT2521RD75 Over 95 Years in Business Albriton’s Jewelry has a long and proud history in serving Mississippians for over 95 years.Family owned and operated since 1920, Albriton’s prides itself on continuing the tradition of excellent customer service, high quality merchandise, and prices that reflect the amazing value we offer. Due to our reputation as a destination store, and having been in business for over 95 years, Albriton’s caters to customers throughout Mississippi and beyond.With our knowledgeable sales staff, and excellent product selection, we are confident that you will find your shopping experience at Albriton’s to be outstanding.   0% Financing Albriton’s Jewelry offers financing through a third party vendor, Synchrony Financial.Through Synchrony Financial we are able to offer our customers several finance options, including up to 12 months interest free!Applying for financing only take five minutes, with just a driver’s license and credit card.Synchrony financial offers low interest rates, reasonable monthly installments, and quick and easy online payments.Financing with Albriton’s will allow you to purchase the jewelry item of your dreams immediately, while enjoying reasonable monthly payments.Contact Albriton’s Jewelry today to inquire about your finance options!   Free Shipping Items with a final sale value over $1,000 can be shipped free of charge to a customer’s local or out of state address.Items that fall under $1,000 will have a nominal shipping fee applied.This fee is determined by the method of shipment, weight of the package, and insurance to cover the item being shipped. 30-Day Returns Items purchased from Albriton’s Jewelry may be returned within 30 days from the date of purchase.In order to receive a refund or exchange, you must have the original receipt with you upon return of the item, and the item must be in its original and unworn condition.The item must be accompanied by the original box, with all warranty cards and explanation booklets intact.Closeouts, estate jewelry, special orders, custom pieces, and altered items (including ring sizing) are not returnable or exchangeable. Watch Warranty All new watches sold by Albriton’s are covered under the corresponding manufacturer’s warranty for the respective timepiece.These warranties range from two to five years depending on the manufacturer and model sold.Albriton’s will issue a two year warranty for any pre-owned watch, or watch that has been fully serviced by Albriton’swatch repair department.The Albriton’s two year warranty covers only the service work done on the timepiece.Albriton’s watch warranty does not extend to normal wear and tear. Item Description Capture her completely as you pop the question with this breathtaking engagement ring from Tacori. This Halo engagement ring that is crafted with 18k yellow gold will leave an everlasting moment that she will never forget. Delightfully symbolizing love and affection, a Prong-set setting is placed upon this piece beautifully, adding appeal to the enchanting center stone. Now she will surely say yes as you present this ring during your proposal. As an authorized dealer of Tacori, Albriton’s Jewelry in Jackson, Mississippi proudly brings you this engagement ring with model number HT2521RD75. Our retail store exclusively carries 100% authentic items from the finest brands in the jewelry business. If you want more information about this ring or any other general inquiries, feel free to reach us by phone, email or by visiting directly to our store. Our friendly representatives will be happy to help you with your inquiries. Available Options Metal Type:  18K Rose Gold,  18K White Gold,  18K Yellow Gold,  Platinum Center Stone Information Center Stone Setting Type: Prong Center Stone Shape: Round Center Stone Type: Not Included (Sold Separately) Center Stone Weight Range - ct: 0.50 to 2.00 Other Stone Shape That Will Fit: Oval, Emerald, Princess Item Specification Engagement Ring Style Milgrain, Vintage Engagement Ring Type Halo Metal Type 18K Yellow Gold Product Type Engagement Rings Set Engagement Ring Side Diamonds Average Clarity VS Side Diamonds Average Color G Side Diamonds Shape - Cut Round Side Diamonds Total Weight - ct 1.19 Side Stones Continuity 1/2 Way Side Stones Setting Type Channel, Pave Stones Type Diamond Shipping Policy Items with a final sale value over $1,000 can be shipped free of charge to a customer’s local or out of state address. Items that fall under $1,000 will have a nominal shipping fee applied. This fee is determined by the method of shipment, weight of the package, and insurance to cover the item being shipped. Return Policy Items purchased from Albriton’s Jewelry may be returned within 30 days from the date of purchase. In order to receive a refund or exchange, you must have the original receipt with you upon return of the item, and the item must be in its original and unworn condition. The item must be accompanied by the original box, with all warranty cards and explanation booklets intact. Closeouts, estate jewelry, special orders, custom pieces, and altered items (including ring sizing) are not returnable or exchangeable. Privacy Policy This privacy policy discloses the privacy practices for www.albritons.com. This privacy policy applies solely to information collected by this web site. It will notify you of the following: What personally identifiable information is collected from you through the web site, how it is used and with whom it may be shared. What choices are available to you regarding the use of your data. The security procedures in place to protect the misuse of your information. How you can correct any inaccuracies in the information. Information Collection, Use, and Sharing We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. We only have access to/collect information that you voluntarily give us via email or other direct contact from you. We will not sell or rent this information to anyone. We will use your information to respond to you, regarding the reason you contacted us. We will not share your information with any third party outside of our organization, other than as necessary to fulfill your request, e.g. to ship an order. Unless you ask us not to, we may contact you via email in the future to tell you about specials, new products or services, or changes to this privacy policy. Your Access to and Control Over Information You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time. You can do the following at any time by contacting us via the email address or phone number given on our website: See what data we have about you, if any. Change/correct any data we have about you. Have us delete any data we have about you. Express any concern you have about our use of your data. Security We take precautions to protect your information. When you submit sensitive information via the website, your information is protected both online and offline. Only employees who need the information to perform a specific job (for example, billing or customer service) are granted access to personally identifiable information. The computers/servers in which we store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment. And what’s this promise all about? Almost three decades ago, in 1988, founder Roy H. Yelton opened a small jewelry shop in what was once a tiny drug store in downtown Hamilton, Ohio. His promise to the community was simple… Treat customers like friends and make exceeding their expectations a tradition. It was a promise he would fulfill each and every day for over two decades until his passing in 2009. Today, the second generation of the Yelton family runs the company, maintaining its reputation for the highest standards of integrity, quality, value, selection and service, but most importantly, fulfilling Roy’s promise and vision of what a jewelry store should really be about.  0% FINANCING Yelton Fine Jewelers is happy to offer affordable and easy financing options to fit any budget! Occasionally, that perfect piece of jewelry may be just outside of your immediate budget. However, our easy and generous credit options allow you to purchase the jewelry of your dreams immediately and still enjoy the ease of convenient monthly payments. Applying for financing online or in-store only takes minutes and you can be pre-approved today! We offer 6 to 12 month interest free financing* as well as interest options (all subject to credit approval and qualified purchases). Contact Yelton Fine Jewelers today to discuss any of our financing options, terms and even free layaways. Click Here to Apply Now! *If minimum payments are not made in a timely manner during the 6 or 12-month  period, then all finance charges from the original date of purchase will be applied. If a balance still exists after the 12-month period, interest will be assessed on  future statements. Lifetime Diamond Upgrade Shop with confidence and find the perfect diamond just for you! We know when you select a diamond from Yelton Fine Jewelers that you’ll love it for life. We also know that love grows and your diamond should be able to grow along with it. We have such tremendous confidence in the quality of our hand-selected diamonds that we offer a full 100% lifetime diamond upgrade. If you ever decide to upgrade your diamond, we'll give you full retail credit toward another item of greater value. Unlike traditional jewelry stores, you don’t have to double the purchase price to get your money back; you only pay the difference. Contact us today for all the lifetime diamond upgrade details. CUSTOM DESIGN SERVICES When you need something truly unique and personal, or you just can’t find exactly what you’re looking for, our staff of talented personal jewelers, goldsmiths and gemologist can create the perfect piece just for you! Whether you wish to update an heirloom, mount a loose gemstone or want to personalize the perfect engagement ring, the craftsmen at Yelton Fine Jewelers can turn your dreams into a reality. Contact us today to make an appointment with a personal jeweler and begin designing that one-of-a-kind piece you’ve always imagined! EXPERT JEWELRY REPAIR We are jewelers in the very true sense of the word. We still manufacture and repair jewelry right here in our store. Let our experienced staff of professional jewelers take care of everything from ring sizing, stone setting, cleaning of gemstones, restringing pearls, prong repair, clasp repair and more! We treat each item you bring us like our very own and each cherished piece is done in-house, in our state of the art repair lab. No matter how simple or complicated, your jewelry will receive the absolute best service and care and it’s all done in a timely manner. Most jewelry repairs are done within a week and same-day express service is available on some jobs.  PURPLE BOX WISHES So why purple? Simple, our founder Roy H. Yelton simply loved the color and its association with royalty. Treating each customer like being part of a royal family was his rule and just before passing in 2009 he changed our corporate color from blue to purple, setting a new standard for the Yelton Fine Jewelers brand. Purple has always been associated with royalty, mystery, wisdom and magic. Now, inside each Yelton’s Purple Box there’s a wish come true, the mystery and magic of that perfect piece of jewelry. It’s a simple reminder of what Roy always wanted for each and every customer - greater value, unsurpassed quality and bringing a smile to someone’s face. So what’s your #PurpleBoxWish? Yelton opened a small jewelry shop in what was once a tiny drug store in downtown Hamilton, Ohio. His promise to the community was simple… Treat customers like friends and make exceeding their expectations a tradition. It was a promise he would fulfill each and every day for over two decades until his passing in 2009. And what’s this promise all about? Almost three decades ago, in 1988, founder Roy H. Yelton opened a small jewelry shop in what was once a tiny drug store in downtown Hamilton, Ohio. His promise to the community was simple… Treat customers like friends and make exceeding their expectations a tradition. It was a promise he would fulfill each and every day for over two decades until his passing in 2009. Today, the second generation of the Yelton family runs the company, maintaining its reputation for the highest standards of integrity, quality, value, selection and service, but most importantly, fulfilling Roy’s promise and vision of what a jewelry store should really be about.  0% FINANCING Yelton Fine Jewelers is happy to offer affordable and easy financing options to fit any budget! Occasionally, that perfect piece of jewelry may be just outside of your immediate budget. However, our easy and generous credit options allow you to purchase the jewelry of your dreams immediately and still enjoy the ease of convenient monthly payments. Applying for financing online or in-store only takes minutes and you can be pre-approved today! We offer 6 to 12 month interest free financing* as well as interest options (all subject to credit approval and qualified purchases). Contact Yelton Fine Jewelers today to discuss any of our financing options, terms and even free layaways. Click Here to Apply Now! *If minimum payments are not made in a timely manner during the 6 or 12-month  period, then all finance charges from the original date of purchase will be applied. If a balance still exists after the 12-month period, interest will be assessed on  future statements. Lifetime Diamond Upgrade Shop with confidence and find the perfect diamond just for you! We know when you select a diamond from Yelton Fine Jewelers that you’ll love it for life. We also know that love grows and your diamond should be able to grow along with it. We have such tremendous confidence in the quality of our hand-selected diamonds that we offer a full 100% lifetime diamond upgrade. If you ever decide to upgrade your diamond, we'll give you full retail credit toward another item of greater value. Unlike traditional jewelry stores, you don’t have to double the purchase price to get your money back; you only pay the difference. Contact us today for all the lifetime diamond upgrade details. CUSTOM DESIGN SERVICES When you need something truly unique and personal, or you just can’t find exactly what you’re looking for, our staff of talented personal jewelers, goldsmiths and gemologist can create the perfect piece just for you! Whether you wish to update an heirloom, mount a loose gemstone or want to personalize the perfect engagement ring, the craftsmen at Yelton Fine Jewelers can turn your dreams into a reality. Contact us today to make an appointment with a personal jeweler and begin designing that one-of-a-kind piece you’ve always imagined! EXPERT JEWELRY REPAIR We are jewelers in the very true sense of the word. We still manufacture and repair jewelry right here in our store. Let our experienced staff of professional jewelers take care of everything from ring sizing, stone setting, cleaning of gemstones, restringing pearls, prong repair, clasp repair and more! We treat each item you bring us like our very own and each cherished piece is done in-house, in our state of the art repair lab. No matter how simple or complicated, your jewelry will receive the absolute best service and care and it’s all done in a timely manner. Most jewelry repairs are done within a week and same-day express service is available on some jobs.  PURPLE BOX WISHES So why purple? Simple, our founder Roy H. Yelton simply loved the color and its association with royalty. Treating each customer like being part of a royal family was his rule and just before passing in 2009 he changed our corporate color from blue to purple, setting a new standard for the Yelton Fine Jewelers brand. Purple has always been associated with royalty, mystery, wisdom and magic. Now, inside each Yelton’s Purple Box there’s a wish come true, the mystery and magic of that perfect piece of jewelry. It’s a simple reminder of what Roy always wanted for each and every customer - greater value, unsurpassed quality and bringing a smile to someone’s face. So what’s your #PurpleBoxWish? Lifetime Diamond Upgrade Lifetime Diamond Upgrade Shop with confidence and find the perfect diamond just for you! We know when you select a diamond from Yelton Fine Jewelers that you’ll love it for life. We also know that love grows and your diamond should be able to grow along with it. We have such tremendous confidence in the quality of our hand-selected diamonds that we offer a full 100% lifetime diamond upgrade. If you ever decide to upgrade your diamond, we'll give you full retail credit toward another item of greater value. Unlike traditional jewelry stores, you don’t have to double the purchase price to get your money back; you only pay the difference. Contact us today for all the lifetime diamond upgrade details. CUSTOM DESIGN SERVICES CUSTOM DESIGN SERVICES When you need something truly unique and personal, or you just can’t find exactly what you’re looking for, our staff of talented personal jewelers, goldsmiths and gemologist can create the perfect piece just for you! Whether you wish to update an heirloom, mount a loose gemstone or want to personalize the perfect engagement ring, the craftsmen at Yelton Fine Jewelers can turn your dreams into a reality. Contact us today to make an appointment with a personal jeweler and begin designing that one-of-a-kind piece you’ve always imagined! EXPERT JEWELRY REPAIR EXPERT JEWELRY REPAIR We are jewelers in the very true sense of the word. We still manufacture and repair jewelry right here in our store. Let our experienced staff of professional jewelers take care of everything from ring sizing, stone setting, cleaning of gemstones, restringing pearls, prong repair, clasp repair and more! We treat each item you bring us like our very own and each cherished piece is done in-house, in our state of the art repair lab. No matter how simple or complicated, your jewelry will receive the absolute best service and care and it’s all done in a timely manner. Most jewelry repairs are done within a week and same-day express service is available on some jobs.  PURPLE BOX WISHES PURPLE BOX WISHES So why purple? Simple, our founder Roy H. Yelton simply loved the color and its association with royalty. Treating each customer like being part of a royal family was his rule and just before passing in 2009 he changed our corporate color from blue to purple, setting a new standard for the Yelton Fine Jewelers brand. Purple has always been associated with royalty, mystery, wisdom and magic. Now, inside each Yelton’s Purple Box there’s a wish come true, the mystery and magic of that perfect piece of jewelry. It’s a simple reminder of what Roy always wanted for each and every customer - greater value, unsurpassed quality and bringing a smile to someone’s face. So what’s your #PurpleBoxWish? And what’s this promise all about? Almost three decades ago, in 1988, founder Roy H. Yelton opened a small jewelry shop in what was once a tiny drug store in downtown Hamilton, Ohio. His promise to the community was simple… Treat customers like friends and make exceeding their expectations a tradition. It was a promise he would fulfill each and every day for over two decades until his passing in 2009. Today, the second generation of the Yelton family runs the company, maintaining its reputation for the highest standards of integrity, quality, value, selection and service, but most importantly, fulfilling Roy’s promise and vision of what a jewelry store should really be about.  0% FINANCING Yelton Fine Jewelers is happy to offer affordable and easy financing options to fit any budget! Occasionally, that perfect piece of jewelry may be just outside of your immediate budget. However, our easy and generous credit options allow you to purchase the jewelry of your dreams immediately and still enjoy the ease of convenient monthly payments. Applying for financing online or in-store only takes minutes and you can be pre-approved today! We offer 6 to 12 month interest free financing* as well as interest options (all subject to credit approval and qualified purchases). We know when you select a diamond from Yelton Fine Jewelers that you’ll love it for life. We also know that love grows and your diamond should be able to grow along with it. We have such tremendous confidence in the quality of our hand-selected diamonds that we offer a full 100% lifetime diamond upgrade. If you ever decide to upgrade your diamond, we'll give you full retail credit toward another item of greater value. Unlike traditional jewelry stores, you don’t have to double the purchase price to get your money back; you only pay the difference. Contact us today for all the lifetime diamond upgrade details. CUSTOM DESIGN SERVICES When you need something truly unique and personal, or you just can’t find exactly what you’re looking for, our staff of talented personal jewelers, goldsmiths and gemologist can create the perfect piece just for you! Whether you wish to update an heirloom, mount a loose gemstone or want to personalize the perfect engagement ring, the craftsmen at Yelton Fine Jewelers can turn your dreams into a reality. Contact us today to make an appointment with a personal jeweler and begin designing that one-of-a-kind piece you’ve always imagined! EXPERT JEWELRY REPAIR We are jewelers in the very true sense of the word. We still manufacture and repair jewelry right here in our store. Let our experienced staff of professional jewelers take care of everything from ring sizing, stone setting, cleaning of gemstones, restringing pearls, prong repair, clasp repair and more! We treat each item you bring us like our very own and each cherished piece is done in-house, in our state of the art repair lab. No matter how simple or complicated, your jewelry will receive the absolute best service and care and it’s all done in a timely manner. Most jewelry repairs are done within a week and same-day express service is available on some jobs.  PURPLE BOX WISHES So why purple? Simple, our founder Roy H. Yelton simply loved the color and its association with royalty. Treating each customer like being part of a royal family was his rule and just before passing in 2009 he changed our corporate color from blue to purple, setting a new standard for the Yelton Fine Jewelers brand. Purple has always been associated with royalty, mystery, wisdom and magic. Now, inside each Yelton’s Purple Box there’s a wish come true, the mystery and magic of that perfect piece of jewelry. It’s a simple reminder of what Roy always wanted for each and every customer - greater value, unsurpassed quality and bringing a smile to someone’s face. So what’s your #PurpleBoxWish? Most jewelry repairs are done within a week and same-day express service is available on some jobs.  So why purple? Simple, our founder Roy H. Yelton simply loved the color and its association with royalty. Treating each customer like being part of a royal family was his rule and just before passing in 2009 he changed our corporate color from blue to purple, setting a new standard for the Yelton Fine Jewelers brand. Purple has always been associated with royalty, mystery, wisdom and magic. Now, inside each Yelton’s Purple Box there’s a wish come true, the mystery and magic of that perfect piece of jewelry. It’s a simple reminder of what Roy always wanted for each and every customer - greater value, unsurpassed quality and bringing a smile to someone’s face. So what’s your #PurpleBoxWish? YELTON FAMILY PROMISE YELTON FAMILY PROMISE So what makes us different? And what’s this promise all about? Almost three decades ago, in 1988, founder Roy H. Yelton opened a small jewelry shop in what was once a tiny drug store in downtown Hamilton, Ohio. His promise to the community was simple… Treat customers like friends and make exceeding their expectations a tradition. It was a promise he would fulfill each and every day for over two decades until his passing in 2009. Today, the second generation of the Yelton family runs the company, maintaining its reputation for the highest standards of integrity, quality, value, selection and service, but most importantly, fulfilling Roy’s promise and vision of what a jewelry store should really be about. 0% FINANCING 0% FINANCING Yelton Fine Jewelers is happy to offer affordable and easy financing options to fit any budget! Occasionally, that perfect piece of jewelry may be just outside of your immediate budget. However, our easy and generous credit options allow you to purchase the jewelry of your dreams immediately and still enjoy the ease of convenient monthly payments. Applying for financing online or in-store only takes minutes and you can be pre-approved today! We offer 6 to 12 month interest free financing* as well as interest options (all subject to credit approval and qualified purchases). Contact Yelton Fine Jewelers today to discuss any of our financing options, terms and even free layaways. Click Here to Apply Now! *If minimum payments are not made in a timely manner during the 6 or 12-month  period, then all finance charges from the original date of purchase will be applied. If a balance still exists after the 12-month period, interest will be assessed on  future statements. Lifetime Diamond Upgrade Lifetime Diamond Upgrade Shop with confidence and find the perfect diamond just for you! We know when you select a diamond from Yelton Fine Jewelers that you’ll love it for life. We also know that love grows and your diamond should be able to grow along with it. We have such tremendous confidence in the quality of our hand-selected diamonds that we offer a full 100% lifetime diamond upgrade. If you ever decide to upgrade your diamond, we'll give you full retail credit toward another item of greater value. Unlike traditional jewelry stores, you don’t have to double the purchase price to get your money back; you only pay the difference. Contact us today for all the lifetime diamond upgrade details. CUSTOM DESIGN SERVICES CUSTOM DESIGN SERVICES When you need something truly unique and personal, or you just can’t find exactly what you’re looking for, our staff of talented personal jewelers, goldsmiths and gemologist can create the perfect piece just for you! Whether you wish to update an heirloom, mount a loose gemstone or want to personalize the perfect engagement ring, the craftsmen at Yelton Fine Jewelers can turn your dreams into a reality. Contact us today to make an appointment with a personal jeweler and begin designing that one-of-a-kind piece you’ve always imagined! EXPERT JEWELRY REPAIR EXPERT JEWELRY REPAIR We are jewelers in the very true sense of the word. We still manufacture and repair jewelry right here in our store. Let our experienced staff of professional jewelers take care of everything from ring sizing, stone setting, cleaning of gemstones, restringing pearls, prong repair, clasp repair and more! We treat each item you bring us like our very own and each cherished piece is done in-house, in our state of the art repair lab. No matter how simple or complicated, your jewelry will receive the absolute best service and care and it’s all done in a timely manner. Most jewelry repairs are done within a week and same-day express service is available on some jobs.  PURPLE BOX WISHES PURPLE BOX WISHES So why purple? Simple, our founder Roy H. Yelton simply loved the color and its association with royalty. Treating each customer like being part of a royal family was his rule and just before passing in 2009 he changed our corporate color from blue to purple, setting a new standard for the Yelton Fine Jewelers brand. Purple has always been associated with royalty, mystery, wisdom and magic. Now, inside each Yelton’s Purple Box there’s a wish come true, the mystery and magic of that perfect piece of jewelry. It’s a simple reminder of what Roy always wanted for each and every customer - greater value, unsurpassed quality and bringing a smile to someone’s face. So what’s your #PurpleBoxWish? On the one hand, there is a compartment with a flap that opens to reveal a section equipped with slots for cards and papers. On the other, there is a zipped compartment at the back with 2 gussets, offering quick access to coins and receipts. HONORÉ 404 is named after the historic Longchamp Store situated in the very heart of Paris. Both structured and restained, the line’s models, with their ingenious compartments, feature a small metal horse by way of a discreet signature. The smooth, silky-feel leather emphasises the streamlined, satiny appearance of this contemporary line. Reference : L3253831001 $USD 355.00 Color : Black Longchamp Dimensions 14x10 cm Colors Black Navy Ruby Taupe Black Customer Service : +33 (0) 1 55 90 59 69 Details Care Find a boutique Like Details Exterior Closing : Zipped and snap closure Compartment : 2 Interior patch pocket : 3 Compartment : 3 Credit card space : 10 Space for money : 1 Space for banknotes : 1 Space for identity card : Yes Care Accessories finishes : Pale gold (Black), Nickel (Navy, Taupe, Ruby) Body : Split cowhide Lining : Polyamide - Jacquard, tone-on-tone Care Never use any cleansing or waterproofing product. To remove any stains, simply brush softly. Recommendation All Longchamp items are created with the utmost care in our workshops. To guarantee their longevity, we recommend that you follow a few simple rules: • protect the product from heavy rain; • avoid all contact with oily products, products containing solvents or alcohol (perfume for example); • avoid prolonged exposure to br ight light; • for dark-coloured items, avoid prolonged contact with light-coloured fabr ics, especially in a humid environment; • for light-coloured items, avoid friction with other materials or prints whose colours may rub off (jeans for example); • be careful not to scr atch or rub the product against abr asive surfaces; • after use, we recommend storing your bag in a case , away from light, humidity and heat. In de eerste plaats is er een vak met klep met ruimte voor kaarten en papieren. Daarnaast is er een ritsvak op de achterkant met twee vakken: eentje voor muntstukken en eentje voor bonnetjes. De Honoré 404-lijn, die minimalistisch en gestructureerd is, legt het accent op de zeer contemporaine soberheid van de Longchamp-tassen. Er staat een klein goudkleurig paard op elk model, wat de tas puur maakt. De lichte, zijdezacht aanvoelende Honoré 404-tassen zijn de nieuwe must-have klassiekers. Ref : L3253831001 180,00 € Kleur: Noir Longchamp Afmetingen 14x10 cm Kleuren Marine Noir Rubis Taupe Noir 180,00 € Toevoegen 180,00 € Longchamp zal u direct terugbellen Details Onderhoud Een winkel vinden Vind ik leuk Details Buitenkant Sluiting : Met rits en drukknoop Compartiment : 2 Binnenkant opgestikt vak : 3 Compartiment : 3 vak credit card : 10 vak voor muntgeld : 1 vak voor papiergeld : 1 vak voor identiteitskaart : Onderhoud Afwerking accessoires: Licht goudkleurig (Zwart), Nikkel (Marineblauw, Taupe, Fuchsia) Hoofddeel: Split vaarsleder Voering: Polyamide – Jacquard, ton sur ton Onderhoud Behandel het product niet. Gebruik geen middelen om het waterdicht te maken.Verwijder vuil met een doek of een zachte borstel. Raadgeving Alle artikelen van Longchamp worden met de grootste zorg vervaardigd in onze ateliers. Om ervoor te zorgen dat uw product langer meegaat, raden wij u aan enkele eenvoudige regels te volgen, zoals: - bescherm het product tegen hevige regenval - vermijd elk contact met vette producten, producten met solventen of alcohol (bijvoorbeeld parfum) - vermijd langdurige blootstelling aan sterk licht - vermijd voor donkere kleuren het langdurige contact met stoffen met een lichte kleur, vooral in een vochtige omgeving - vermijd voor lichte kleuren de wrijving met andere materialen of prints waarvan de kleur zou kunnen afgeven (bijvoorbeeld jeans) - zorg ervoor dat u het product niet bekrast of tegen een schurend oppervlak wrijft - bewaar uw product na gebruik rechtopstaand in een hoes, beschermd tegen licht, vochtigheid en warmte. Een winkel vinden Levering TRANSPORTKOSTEN Van € 0,00 tot € 100,00 = € 9,00 Boven de € 100,00 = € 12,00 TERMIJN - 4-6 werkdagen te rekenen vanaf het plaatsen van de bestelling van artikelen uit de collectie; De te koop aangeboden artikelen worden alleen geleverd binnen België. Betaling --NOT NEEDED-- De betaling van uw aankopen gaat uitsluitend in op het moment dat u de bestelling plaatst, via credit card (betaalkaart, Visa, Eurocard/Mastercard, American express) of via een Paypal rekening. --NOT NEEDED-- Uw aankopen geschieden in alle veiligheid; de vertrouwelijkheid van de bankgegevens die u via deze website aan een geautoriseerde bank verstrekt, is verzekerd in een beveiligde omgeving (SSL-protocol). On the one hand, there is a compartment with a flap that opens to reveal a section equipped with slots for cards and papers. On the other, there is a zipped compartment at the back with 2 gussets, offering quick access to coins and receipts. HONORÉ 404 is named after the historic Longchamp Store situated in the very heart of Paris. Both structured and restained, the line’s models, with their ingenious compartments, feature a small metal horse by way of a discreet signature. The smooth, silky-feel leather emphasises the streamlined, satiny appearance of this contemporary line. Reference : L3253831001 180,00 € Color : Black Longchamp Dimensions 14x10 cm Colors Black Navy Ruby Taupe Black Customer Service : +44 (0)20 7493 8500 Details Care Find a boutique Shipping Payment methods Like Details Exterior Closing : Zipped and snap closure Compartment : 2 Interior patch pocket : 3 Compartment : 3 Credit card space : 10 Space for money : 1 Space for banknotes : 1 Space for identity card : Yes Care Accessories finishes : Pale gold (Black), Nickel (Navy, Taupe, Ruby) Body : Split cowhide Lining : Polyamide - Jacquard, tone-on-tone Care Never use any cleansing or waterproofing product. To remove any stains, simply brush softly. Recommendation All Longchamp items are created with the utmost care in our workshops. To guarantee their longevity, we recommend that you follow a few simple rules: • protect the product from heavy rain; • avoid all contact with oily products, products containing solvents or alcohol (perfume for example); • avoid prolonged exposure to br ight light; • for dark-coloured items, avoid prolonged contact with light-coloured fabr ics, especially in a humid environment; • for light-coloured items, avoid friction with other materials or prints whose colours may rub off (jeans for example); • be careful not to scr atch or rub the product against abr asive surfaces; • after use, we recommend storing your bag in a case , away from light, humidity and heat. On the one hand, there is a compartment with a flap that opens to reveal a section equipped with slots for cards and papers. On the other, there is a zipped compartment at the back with 2 gussets, offering quick access to coins and receipts. HONORÉ 404 is named after the historic Longchamp Store situated in the very heart of Paris. Both structured and restained, the line’s models, with their ingenious compartments, feature a small metal horse by way of a discreet signature. The smooth, silky-feel leather emphasises the streamlined, satiny appearance of this contemporary line. To guarantee their longevity, we recommend that you follow a few simple rules: • protect the product from heavy rain; • avoid all contact with oily products, products containing solvents or alcohol (perfume for example); • avoid prolonged exposure to br ight light; • for dark-coloured items, avoid prolonged contact with light-coloured fabr ics, especially in a humid environment; • for light-coloured items, avoid friction with other materials or prints whose colours may rub off (jeans for example); • be careful not to scr atch or rub the product against abr asive surfaces; • after use, we recommend storing your bag in a case , away from light, humidity and heat.
